tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am petrified of visiting a dentist. Dr. Perola Menon put me at ease. Explained the line of treatment. Was very reassuring and she had the most amazing light hand. 
I have found a dentist who has taken away my fear of dentists.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Menon has been my dentist and the dentist for my family for the past 26 years. She has a wonderfully  friendly and soothing manner and a warm smile which puts both adults and children at ease immediately.  She has immense experience and has shown exceptional competence in whatever work she has undertaken for myself & family, whether it is a simple cleaning or bleaching, or complex procedures like root canal , impacted wisdom tooth extraction or what she did recently, a dental implant. 
I have complete trust in her and would never go to anybody else. I would strongly recommend her to anybody who wants painless and the best possible dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Dr Perola Menon for root canal surgery and scaling/ polishing of my teeth. She explained the problem that I was facing and the resolution process to be carried out very clearly. 

Found her to be very professional , gentle with her hands and skillful at her work .The root canal process was painless and was performed in just 45 minutes.

The clinic is clean , well maintained , hygienic and covid protocals were adhered to strictly. The staff was polite and organised.

 Highly recommend this clinic - Pradeep

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
There are several factors which made my visit to the  doctor very memorable:
1.The doctor is very friendly and full of compassion which rubs off on you.
2. The doctor always does a  thorough professional job.
3. Gets in external assistance from specialists when necessary
4.There is a strong feeling of  a family atmosphere
5. The support staff in the clinic are always cheerful and supportive
6. The ambience of the clinic is attractive with soft music  playing
7. The last little thing that delighted me was that while my teeth were being drilled and patched  and being knocked out I could look out of the window and watch the leaves of a huge tree rustling gently in the  breeze 
making each sitting a delight to the soul.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The experience at The Dental Care Clinic was very pleasant and free of any hassles. Dr Menon handled the procedure both efficiently and graciously while patiently answering all my questions. I was a little concerned with a cap that had aged a bit and her comprehensive examination and tips to keep it going for a few more years were very reassuring.
It was also a pleasant surprise  to see how the clinic has adapted to handle the concerns and risks associated with COVID. Right from the waiting area and throughout the procedure the team has put together a slew of safety measures to minimise risk of infection. Kudos to Dr Menon and her team!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Excellent Doctor, very high quality, caring and with a good team.
Advises on what is really required and in the best interest of the patient

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Excellent care. Very hygienic, courteous and efficient doctor and staff. Would highly recommend and have done to all my friends and family. Been going to the same doctor for 31 years and wouldn’t change to anyone else. Totally satisfying experience in every way. Dr. Menon is very gentle and has a wonderful light touch and is very considerate. Wonderful clinic and experience all told.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Perola explains every step of the procedure. She’s patient,  very caring and is attentive to the needs of the patient. Even before leaving the chair she explains well the after care that needs to be followed. 

I am always very scared to visit a dentist and it is this fear that has led to so many dental issues I have today. However,  with Dr Perola’s gentle touch and her caring nature all my fears have vanished. 

Thank you Dr. Perola.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,

Dr Perola Menon is the kindest & most friendly orthodontist I've known. She is able to handle her patients' dental issues with her easy manner of speaking. Her cosmetic treatment is the best I've experienced in Mumbai so far. 
I wish her all the very best in her dental practice.
